insert hook between the last step 8 insert hook into last stitch of the step 9 repeat step 6-8 until the stitch post of the star draw up a loop 3 p revious star draw up a loop 4 loops end loops on loop 2 loops work a normal half_double_crochet row 2 skip first st 2sc in each star eye single_crochet into the top of the chain stitches from row 1 end off leaving a tail to sew strap to the sole of the sandal attach the strap by ➢ finding the centermost stitch at the top of the sole ➢ count stitches evenly down either side of the sole i counted seven either side of the center stitch center stitch working into the 8th 11th slip stitches ➢ using the ends of the strap attach to the sole using the slip stiches as a guide i found the strap for me was four slip stitches in width 6 making the heel work this for both soles find the center stitch of the heel and count 7 stitches either side row 1 starting on the right side join yarn with a chain 1 and single_crochet in the same st single_crochet in each of the next 14 st turn 15 st row 2 single_crochet in the same stitch and in each st around turn 15 st row 3 chain 3 make 7 stars using the star stitch across half_double_crochet in last st as well turn 7 stars + 1 half_double_crochet make this first star like the strap using the chain stitches and base of the first st row 4 chain 1 skip next st 2sc into the eye of each star around single_crochet into the top of the chain 3 from beginning of the row 15 st turn row 5 chain 1 single_crochet in each st 15 st you will have created the ankle section it should measure approx 1
